title: The Southbound Bus
description: Monica is promoted from search & rescue, and receives her first assignment from Tess. She is to help a boy living with his father, whose mother ran away after her daughter died. Monica bungles her assignment, but she does reunite the family

title: Show Me the Way Home
description: Monica substitutes at a school for the history teacher, and also becomes the assistant coach for the baseball team. A student on the baseball team needs help with his game. Monica helps him as well as the stubborn coach.

title: Tough Love
description: A famous journalist takes a hard line regarding her daughter's drinking problem -- but her granddaughter may pay the price.

title: Fallen Angela
description: Monica learns to overcome her fear of water when she lives next door to Angela Evans.

title: Cassie's Choice
description: A pregnant teen must decide what to do.

title: The Heart of the Matter
description: Monica helps a lawyer with an imaginary heart condition find love.

title: An Unexpected Snow
description: Monica and Tess arrange an accident on a deserted road for two friends Megan and Sasha, who are dating the same man. The Angels create a house, where the two friends, and Megan's husband have Thanksgiving dinner.

title: Manny
description: The angels help with a social event for a well-known doctor, his wife and mother. A young child shows up at their home, claiming to be the child they agreed to sponsor. The wife welcomes the child, but the doctor and his mother are worried.

title: Fear Not
description: Monica must help Joey, who has a mental condition, deal with the fact that his friend Serena is dying from a heart condition. Serena was to be the angel at the town's Christmas pageant. When she dies, a bright light leads Joey to the play.

title: There But for the Grace of God
description: Monica is stripped of her angel powers to help a proud homeless man named Pete she also becomes friends with Sofia and Zack Monica realizes that she had bad judgment of homeless people, and after saying a prayer. She washes Pete's feet and then with God's help Pete is able to go to Colorado to spread his wife . Ashes

title: The Hero
description: Monica and Tess help a sheriff come to terms with his own past while trying to help his son not commit suicide.

title: Interview with an Angel
description: Tess tells Monica she must answer a newspaper ad looking for an angel. Monica replies and says she is an angel. Callie is someone who doubts. Monica tells Callie about the cases she has worked on, and Callie learns to believe.

title: Trust
description: Monica becomes a rookie cop to help a policeman who is returning to duty after being shot and is addicted to pain pills. She helps him regain his confidence and recover from drug addiction.

title: Sympathy for the Devil
description: Monica helps a man who seems to have all he needs, and only wants his family to be healthy and happy. But his life is about to be upset with evil. An old friend of Monica's is there to work with the man, but she is the source of evil.

title: The Driver
description: Tess assigns Monica to help a woman who is dedicated to her TV reporting job, always pushing herself. When she hits a boy with her car, it makes her reexamine her life, remembering her attempted suicide when she was younger.

title: Angels on the Air
description: Melissa Joan Hart stars as a teenager whose mother is a radio DJ with a sharp commentary. To raise her show's rating, the mother offers a date to the prom with her daughter. The angels must help heal the family after this happens.

title: In the Name of God
description: Tess returns to Gulliford where she had a previous assignment and she looks forward to seeing the boy again. She gives Monica her task, but then finds out a white supremacists is involved. Tess does not act like an angel.

title: Reunion
description: The angels help a man and a woman connect with his mother when the man wants to marry the woman. The woman is HIV positive, and the mother is not happy about the prospect.

title: Operation Smile
description: Ginger is a single mother who tries to do everything for her child who has a cleft lip. Monica is the babysitter who helps the mother an child.

title: The Big Bang
description: A woman who is unhappy in her marriage asks for a divorce. Her husband is a bank manager who only has time for work. While Monica is in the bank at the closing hour, a man takes people hostage because they will not take his deposit.

title: Unidentified Female
description: Monica helps a woman who witnesses a man getting shot.

title: The Feather
description: A crooked preacher claims a feather came from an angel's wing and proves God is directing him.

title: The One That Got Away
description: Friends who have not seen each other since law school get together for a wedding of two from the group. Monica and Tess act as wedding coordinators. Monica helps a man right a wrong, and a woman coming to terms with her fiancé's suicide.

title: Til We Meet Again
description: Andrew has an assignment to help an elderly man in his death. As his children come home for a final visit, the man reveals a terrible secret. Monica must help the family heal.

title: Rock 'N' Roll Dad
description: After a woman's death, her husband and children must learn to move forward with their lives.

title: Indigo Angel
description: An elderly man in ill-health manages a blues club which he refuses to close for business even though it no longer makes money. He is waiting for a sign that he is supposed to close the club.

title: Jacob's Ladder
description: Monica goes to the wrong place to help someone, so the other angels are not able to help her. Monica is arrested for selling drugs and is put in an insane asylum since people think she is crazy. While at the home, she helps another patient.

title: Out of the Darkness
description: After a car accident, a man slips into a coma. Five years later, he awakens and tries to fit back into his life. His wife has fallen in love with his business partner and his young son does not remember him. Monica begins to doubt herself.

title: Lost and Found
description: Tess works for the Center of Missing Children, and Monica works with a policeman who searches for missing children. Monica faces a fallen angel who tries to destroy the policeman and his mission.

title: Dear God
description: A postal worker who is a holocaust survivor answers letters that people mail to God. Max has lost his faith and uses the letters to try to connect again. Monica helps him find his way again as he tries to help a child whose father has died.

title: The Portrait of Mrs. Campbell
description: Monica must help a mother and her pregnant daughter-in-law find a way to live together when the son is deployed in the service. The mother constantly reminds her daughter-in-law that it is her child more than a husband.

title: The Quality of Mercy
description: Tess and Monica attend college to help a former television star who has become a drama teacher at the college. Ever since he stopped being a television star, his family has become fractured.

title: Flesh and Blood
description: A young man who has a history of delinquency is accused of killing a girl. His mother backs his claim that he's innocent. When he is released due to lack of evidence, the girl's father wants him gone and tells his mother. Later she discovers that her son has in his possession something that belongs to the girl which makes her doubt his innocence.

title: Birthmarks
description: A man dying of cancer, and his wife, returns to his father's farm. The couple has a surrogate mother carrying their child. The father says he will not accept the child as he grandson. As the man dies, the child is born with a kiss birthmark

title: Statute of Limitations
description: A seemingly confident talk show host is controlled by her disabled sister Claudia via microphone for everything she says and does on the show. Claudia is bitter because as children they were in a car crash and Morgan did not suffer injuries.

title: Promised Land
description: A family is down to its last dollar, traveling by trailer to a new town, hoping for a job and home. The angels restore his faith and inspire him to help others who are down on their luck just like he had been.

title: A Joyful Noise
description: A sweet young girl who sings like an angel claims to hear voices by angels. Her parents have her seen by a psychologist who has his own problems. Monica and Tess help the man heal from his past in order that he can help the young girl.

title: Random Acts
description: Monica becomes an assistant teacher to help Mike, a teacher of 20 years who is questioning his career. Two former students who are now hoodlums kidnap the teacher so they can steal his boat.

title: Sins of the Father
description: A teenager is in prison on death row, and does not realize his father is also in prison. The family is torn apart, and the younger child at home is about to start a life of crime. The angels help heal the family.

title: Written in Dust
description: Monica helps an archaeologist connect with his grandfather who is failing in health. The grandfather has been trying to help the archaeologist return to his father.

title: Secret Service
description: A secret service agent does well at her job, but does not know how to relax and enjoy her personal life. Monica becomes part of her team to protect a presidential candidate.

title: Groundrush
description: A pilot of a small airplane does good deeds by flying people to hospitals, ceremonies, and more. The man is accused of murder and Monica helps his escape prison in order to prove his innocence.

title: The Sky Is Falling
description: Monica is assigned to help Leonard who has fears of Halloween. Monica first worked with Leonard in 1938, the day that Orson Welles broadcast his War of the Worlds radio story. Both Monica and Leonard carry dread from that day.

title: Something Blue
description: As a woman prepares for her marriage, she has doubts about it lasting. Her father shows up for the wedding, but she has not seen him for a number of years. The angels are wedding coordinators who help with more than just the wedding.

title: Into the Light
description: A man is arrested in a sting operation for bribery, but since he has a heart condition he is taken to a hospital. Tess and Monica pose as nurses as he has a heart transplant. The man realizes he has a second chance.

title: The Homecoming: Part 1
description: Monica, Tess, and Andrew help a down-on-her-luck prostitute who stays drunk more than anything else. After getting cleaned up, she moves to a small town where she must confront her past which caused her to become a prostitute to begin with.

title: The Journalist
description: Monica helps an investigative reporter and the retired couple who's lives were affected by her reporting.

title: The Violin Lesson
description: Monica helps a violin maker finish a violin he started thirty years ago when his son was born. His son has come home to die due to AIDS, and the father finishes the violin as a tribute to his son's life.

title: Forget-Me-Not
description: A librarian's daughter feels smothered by her mother. The mother tries to do everything for her daughter, not allowing her daughter to make her own decisions and live her own life. Monica helps the mother and daughter.

title: Smokescreen
description: Mark is a distinguished lawyer who returns to his old neighborhood. He represents a tobacco company in a class action suit. What Mark does not know is that his father works for the tobacco company and has lung cancer.

title: Crisis of Faith
description: A minister is involved in a car-accident and his son dies in the other car. Now the minister is beginning to doubt his own abilities - and God - just when the son's surviving friend, a girl he convinced not to steal the church's teen-center money to run away from her overbearing father, has the strength and need to talk to him.

title: Angel of Death
description: Tess works with new angel Celeste. A magician promotes himself as the angel of death but has a terrible secret from his past that haunts him. Celeste works as the magician's assistant.

title: Clipped Wings
description: Monica is due for her angel evaluation. She runs into Kathleen, a fallen angel who tricks Monica into another meeting room. Andrew & Tess wait for Monica in the right place. While waiting, the angels recall previous assignments.

title: Amazing Grace: Part 1
description: Tess revisits the Green's. She tells them God says they need to stay in one place for a while, but Josh needs to go with Tess. Josh has to help Monica see, since she is temporarily blinded. Josh is involved in a drive-by shooting.

title: Amazing Grace: Part 2
description: Josh is blinded due to a drive-by shooting. His family visits and they all must find their faith.

title: Labor of Love
description: A woman hopes to surprise her husband by flying to Paris with him, but has her own surprise when he is with another woman who is pregnant with his child. The other woman goes into labor during flight, and the woman helps deliver the child.

title: Have You Seen Me?
description: Hank sees a picture of a missing child on a milk carton and realize it is his younger brother. Monica helps him find out the boy was kidnapped years ago. Tess and Andrew help the real father and the lawyer who helped place the young boy.

title: Last Call
description: Monica is told she can use one miracle to help someone at a bar, but as all the patrons seem to need help, she does not know how to decide which person to help.

title: Missing in Action
description: George is an old army veteran from WWII, Korea, and Vietnam, who thinks he has nothing left to live for. He has also been removed from six separate retirement homes. Monica is assigned to show him the joy of living again.

title: At Risk
description: The angels help troubled teens that commit crimes by matching them up to disabled children.

title: Full Moon
description: A rapist who was convicted and now paroled goes to the town of the victim. She is terrified of him. The rapist visits her, asking for forgiveness. She refuses. The angels help all of them with the healing.

title: An Angel by Any Other Name
description: The angels are in a small town, where a group home opens their doors to children with Downs Syndrome. The neighbor across the street finds these children disturbing.

title: Inherit the Wind
description: A father is disappointed in his son, Kevin, who parties and squanders money as a way of life. When the father dies, Kevin finds out he is cut out of the will and his inheritance. Kevin must learn to get a job and earn his own money.

title: A Delicate Balance
description: A mother spends all her time focusing on her daughter's gymnastics career and does not notice her son feels neglected.

title: The Road Home: Part 1
description: Joe Greene returns to his brother Russell's home where his son is living. On the drive, he causes an accident that kills two people and puts a child in the hospital. He does not tell anyone. Part 2 is finished on the Promised Land.

title: Great Expectations
description: A couple expecting their first child have a baby shower at a café where Andrew is the temporary worker. Tess and Monica are Lamaze teachers. During a visit to the doctor, the parents learn their child has Down Syndrome.

title: Nothing But Net
description: The angels help a teen and a basketball player. The basketball player is an aggressive player and lives his life with anger. His fan is the teen who wants to live his life like the player.

title: Children of the Night
description: The angels help some homeless children who have banded together to be a family. They need a secure place to live and to find their faith again.

title: Jones vs. God
description: A distraught farmer in a drought-stricken community files suit against God. Tess arrives to defend, and Monica to testify. The trial teaches the farmer and everyone else in town the value of being good neighbors, and also drives home a stern lesson about the inherent folly of theodicy--an attempt to judge God by human standards.

title: The Pact
description: At a summer camp, four teenagers are planning to commit suicide because they are HIV-positive and feel they are going to die anyway. The girls come with attitudes as well. The angels help them see life is worth living.

title: Sandcastles
description: Monica and Rafael have a day off and go to the beach. Their vacation is cut short when they find a message in a bottle from someone asking for help.

title: My Dinner with Andrew
description: Andrew is an eligible bachelor placed on auction to raise money for medical research. A female doctor wins the bid for Andrew, but then refuses to go on a date since she is too busy. Andrew teaches her to enjoy the life God gave her.

title: Charades
description: Libby's father was on the Hollywood Blacklist in the 1950s, but is now being honored. Libby's father is dead, but his best friend and Libby's mother are to accept the award. When Vera refuses, Libby finds out the truth from that time.

title: The Comeback
description: Carol Burnett and her real life daughter star as a mother and daughter with acting aspirations. Monica teaches them that their luck is not from signs and omens but rather is the love from God.

title: Venice
description: Annie is a bitter widow who is losing her eyesight. She is angry with her friends every since her husband died years previous. The angels help the friends talk to each other and find the truth about the husband's death.

title: It Came Upon a Midnight Clear
description: Wayne gets upset when Joey breaks a special ornament for the Christmas tree. He leaves the house and Joey is alone. Monica visits Joey and takes care of him, telling his a story of Christmas past. After much worry, Wayne comes home.

title: Deconstructing Harry
description: Tess has an assignment to take a driver's test and help the examiner. During the test, the examiner dashes into a funeral home and steals the ashes of her married lover. Tess becomes the accomplice in the crime.

title: The Trigger
description: Linda is graduating from law school. Her sister Holly comes for the ceremony. Holly learns her sister is being physically abused by her husband. The angels and Holly help the husband to control his anger, and help Linda & the children heal.

title: Doodlebugs
description: A town has abandoned one of their churches and faith seems to have died in town. When a pay phone mysteriously rings whenever someone walks by, people start believing God is contacting them.

title: Redeeming Love
description: Monica helps a young mother overcome her drug addition. Meanwhile, Tess helps the parents learn not to enable their daughter in her drug life. The woman has to learn to be a real mother to her child and become the artist she is meant to be.

title: Flights of Angels
description: The angels help a man who is dying from Lou Gehrig's disease learn how to find peace and help his family through the ordeal.

title: Breaking Bread
description: A woman is a witness to a brutal hate crime, but he is afraid to go to the police to report what he saw. The angels help him overcome his fear in order that justice be done.

title: God and Country
description: An Army command is bitter and being difficult with his recruits. His wife and son have died, but for him, it is worse that one of his soldiers died at the same time.

title: How Do You Spell Faith?
description: Aaron is an intelligent teen who enters a spelling contest. His brother Michael is the only one who supports him as the mother gives all her attention to Michael. The father deserted them. The angels help heal the family.

title: Seek and Ye Shall Find
description: Monica slips and falls when walking on ice. She does not remember her name or her faith. As she works with a doctor, she starts to remember and helps the doctor find his own faith.

title: Cry and You Cry Alone
description: Maury and his comedy partner split their act years ago in anger, but now are being inducted into the Hall of Fame. They try to get along to perform an act for the induction ceremony, but argue about who is the real star.

title: Perfect Little Angel
description: Tracy receives bad news in the mail and now is desperate to earn money to pay for her college tuition. She decides to enter the local beauty pageant to win the prize money. The angels help her with the pageant and to learn what is important.

title: Elijah
description: A man is ordered by the court to stay in his own slum apartments for two weeks. He has lost his faith and has forgotten all his father taught him. When his son is shot and no help is found in the building, Monica tells him to remember God.

title: Last Dance
description: Two teens plan to marry after they finish high school. When the mothers meet, they recognize each other, and it opens old wounds that could tear the teenagers apart. The angels must heal the mother's friendship and save the teens.

title: The Spirit of Liberty Moon: Part 1
description: Monica is assigned to accompany a group of U.S. businesspeople to China to negotiate a merger.

title: The Spirit of Liberty Moon: Part 2
description: Monica discovers a delegation member has risked her life by returning to China to find her daughter.

title: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
description: The angels tend to patients in the hospital, some whom are dying, some who have lost hope, and those who have faith they will get better. An elderly man who is dying asks Andrew to help another soul that is also dying.

title: Vengeance Is Mine: Part 1
description: After Russell Greene's brother Joe caused the death of a father and son, the widow started to drink, neglect her living son, and send threatening letters to Joe. Joe leaves town to work on an oil rig. Part 2 is finished on the Promised Land

title: What Are Friends For?
description: A young woman is running for mayor and her campaign places her in the lead. But then a friend of hers is being accused of sexual misconduct with a student in his classroom. Monica helps her understand what she should do.

title: Only Connect
description: A young boy on a baseball team befriends Ferdie who helps out on the team. Ferdie is autistic, and none of the other players seem to accept him. Cameron's father is the coach who has problems at home. Ferdie helps mend the family.

title: Lady of the Lake
description: Monica owns a bait store near the town's lake, in which the fish are dying and the town's residents are listless about the future of their town. A land developer want's Monica's land to plow everything under, but she helps the town heal.

title: Beautiful Dreamer
description: Tess becomes a teacher at a school in a poor district with young children. One child turns in an essay about wanting to be a hit man when he grows up. Tess tells a story about Abraham Lincoln to the students, giving them insight into life.

title: I Do
description: Stephanie & her fiancé plan to elope as her future mother-in-law does not approve of her. When they get into an accident, Will is seriously injured. Will's mother wants him off life support, but Stephanie has faith that God has other plans.

title: The Wind Beneath My Wings
description: A judicial judge is confident in her profession, but depends on her mother for everything else. Her mother is only too eager to help. Monica and Tess help the mother and daughter see they have much more to live for than just each other.

title: Psalm 151
description: It is Monica's 100th case, and not an easy one. She must help a young child fulfill his list of last wishes before he dies. One of his wishes is for his mother to finish a song she had started when he was born.

title: The Peacemaker
description: A bickering couple, grieving over the murder of their teen son, discover what his last act produced.

title: An Angel on the Roof
description: A young pregnant Mexican woman delivers her baby in a cheap motel while running from immigration authorities.

title: Fool for Love
description: A lawyer tells Monica about her troubled past and a lost baby. Her past has caught up with her current life. Tess listens to a man who has work problems and feels there is nothing left in life.

title: The Medium and the Message
description: Monica has an assignment that should take just a few minutes. The president of a television network wants to produce a show about angels, but sometimes forgets in his quest to be the number one network. Monica gets him to follow his heart.

title: My Brother's Keeper
description: Will and Jeff are raised together by Will's father and compete in skiing. The father favors Jeff as he is the better skier. When Jeff becomes a paraplegic in an accident, the father blames Will. Jeff does not want to live.

title: On Edge
description: A con-artist father involves his daughter in his crimes. She wants to be a figure skater. When the father and daughter get caught, the father denies blame. His daughter confesses because she wants to put down roots in the town to skate.

title: The Man Upstairs
description: A salesman is in Las Vegas to renew an insurance policy with a gambling hotel. Desperate for money for his ailing wife, he gambles all the money he has while waiting for the policy renewal. He ends up selling his soul to the devil.

title: Family Business
description: Ben owns a car dealership which is run by his family, except for Buddy. Ben tries to control all aspects of the family, but Buddy wanted to be his own individual. After five years, Buddy returns. His father learns to accept Buddy's choices.

title: The Anatomy Lesson
description: After a little girl falls in an abandoned airshaft, a man dies of a heart attack while running to get help. Monica helps the coroner do an autopsy which leads to discovering what he was doing when he died, saving the coroner & little girl.

title: Jagged Edges
description: Andrew helps a man with household chores who will die of a heart attack. As he dies, he asks Andrew to give a box to his comedian daughter. The daughter returns home to bad memories, and finds a secret about her dead mother in the box.

title: Into the Fire
description: Melina cannot find a permanent job or a reason for her life after her fiancé cancels the wedding. She meets a charismatic man who tells her she can everything she wants - in a cult. Monica joins the cult with her to save her and the leader.

title: Made in the U.S.A.
description: Nick Stratton is a returned Vietnam veteran managing a clothing factory staffed by refugees. His personal problems are exaggerated when the IRS starts chasing him for back taxes. The angels get involved when he starts mistreating his employees.

title: Full Circle
description: Monica returns to a woman named Kate who has more problems than the previous time. Kate is in danger of losing her house, and has not seen her son in seven years. Her son returns, and has his own child. Kate still has problems.

title: Black Like Monica
description: Monica is assigned to a town troubled by racial violence -- and changed into a black mortal woman.

title: Fighting the Good Fight
description: Two boys stay with their uncle since their mother is in jail. The eleven year old is picked on by his brother and other older kids. He takes up boxing to defend himself.

title: Hearts
description: A teenager needs a heart transplant. Her doctor has a daughter who is a friend of the teenager. A heart becomes available when a woman falls and has brain damage. The team heals the husband and the doctor's relationship with her daughter.

title: Godspeed
description: The angels must help a woman astronaut find her faith after her mother's death. She goes on a space mission and while working outside the missile, her teeth cable becomes loose. She is unable to contact the team inside the missile.

title: Such a Time as This
description: A US senator is called upon to bring to light the suffering of the people of Sudan in the illegal slave trade. Initially the senator (married to a political cynic) refuses but nudged by her son it soon changes.

title: The Compass
description: Set during World War II, 5 US troopers are caught behind enemy lines. As each one dies they leave letters, that is, all except one.

title: The Last Day of the Rest of Your Life
description: A support group for terminally ill people try to prepare themselves for their own death. Monica leads the group and helps each of them recognize what they want to do to fulfill their final wishes.

title: The Letter
description: A migrant family follows the crops. Tino has a musical gift and Tess helps him use his voice in the local church and submit for a musical scholarship. The father hurts his back & needs Tino in the fields. The angels help them find a way.

title: Til Death Do Us Part
description: Molly plans a surprise party for her husband when she learns she is dying from cancer. Andrew is a worker on their farm and tells Molly to tell her husband. Andrew learns he is not there for Molly as there is another tragedy about to happen

title: The Occupant
description: Lonnie is a homeless man who is taken the hospital ER because is suicidal. Lonnie's friend Duncan is the doctor. Lonnie has a split personality and the dominant one is trying to take Lonnie's soul. The angels and Duncan help heal Lonnie.

title: Voice of an Angel
description: A member of an inner-city choir is more concerned with her solo entry in a competition than the group's performance.

title: The Whole Truth and Nothing But...
description: The angels help a newspaper reporter remember her original ideals in finding and reporting the news.

title: Then Sings My Soul
description: Uncle Dudley owned a taffy store, and had a television show for the children. When he died, his son inherited the business but it is losing money. The angels show him how much the people love his store and the memory of his father.

title: The Christmas Gift
description: Robert wants to visit his mother, and his wife reluctantly agrees even though she does not like the old neighborhood. As days pass, the mother calls Robert to help her, and he is killed in transit. The two women are angry at each other.

title: Millennium
description: At a holiday party Nick proposes to Angela but she fears commitment. Angela talks to Andrew about her father, the reason for her fear, and the time capsule they built. She agrees to open the capsule and then finds the truth about her father

title: With God as My Witness
description: A construction worker is fired because he spoke out about the shortcuts being taken on a building being built. Desperate for a job, he becomes a chauffeur and finds the clients are gangsters. He is torn by making money versus doing right.

title: A House Divided
description: A boy's parents are separated and bickering. The boy feels torn and he wants to divorce his parents.

title: The Perfect Game
description: Love turned to hate motivates a woman to set up a perfect bowling game for her ex, so she can have the satisfaction of shattering his joy.

title: Buy Me a Rose
description: A successful business man has time for his work but not for his wife. When he is unavailable for their 20th wedding anniversary, the wife connects with a former boyfriend.

title: Life Before Death
description: Monica works with a group of teenagers from Ireland for a missionary program in the United States. They are to restore an old home and must work in harmony. Two teens are Catholic; two are Protestants.

title: Here I Am
description: An art museum, a Vietnam vet, a boy, an artist a dying mother all come together for the final day security guard. Haunted by a painting and his past a Vietnam veteran played by Ed Asner must come to terms with a tragic Christmas day.

title: Bar Mitzvah
description: An elderly man no longer believes in God. When he finds out his devout son is dying from a brain tumor, he must find his own faith again.

title: True Confessions
description: Monica and Tess enter a woman's prison to help a woman who was wrongly convicted of killing a man. Monica helps stage a play in prison to get the women to open up. Andrew helps the father of that man come to forgive the woman falsely accused.

title: Quality Time
description: The angels help a teenager whose family lives on a time-line for every activity. The teen is diagnosed with diabetes and it interrupts her athletic schedule and the parent's life as they try to open a new restaurant.

title: Living the Rest of My Life
description: A grown man is too attached to his mother to let her live her own life and have her own money. Monica visits for a clothing donation and gets Abby to visit the senior home. Abby moves there, and her son tries to get her to move back home.

title: Stealing Hope
description: Ricky is a gas station attendant who just lost his job since the station is closing. Monica goes to help with the closing inventory of items. She convinces him that a door closing opens another door, and he needs to pursue his poetry.

title: Monica's Bad Day
description: While learning to parallel park, Monica bumps into a man who walks in front of the car. While not hurt, he is rude to her. Monica is upset and it seems to affect her whole day regardless of how she tries to make it up to him.

title: A Clown's Prayer
description: Monica, Tess, and Andrew attend a circus to help a young boy who has been in the circus all his life. His father is a dwarf who is the circus clown. Both have trouble accepting the father's height.

title: Mother's Day
description: Greg and Ellen are drifting apart after 19 years of marriage. Monica works as Ellen's personal assistant to help from within. Andrew is a developer who buys the same land that Greg wants. Can they save the marriage?

title: Pandora's Box
description: With a new computer in the house, a young daughter accidentally clicks a link to a porn site. When the father takes control to change the site, he becomes interested in online porn and it starts to affect his home and work life.

title: The Face on the Bar Room Floor
description: The angels help a father who wants to disinherit his son since the son is only interested in the social life.

title: Legacy
description: A father pressures his college-bound son to join the same fraternity he joined when he was in college. The fraternity practices dangerous hazing. The angels show the father that his son has to follow his own life.

title: The Invitation
description: It's Halloween, and a young couple is having a party. There are spooks around, and Satan comes to the party. The angels protect the man and his pregnant wife.

title: Restoration
description: A young film student has trouble interviewing a 102-year old film director who is ready to die. Andrew tells him he must stay on earth a little longer to help the student.

title: Finger of God
description: A storm chaser is excited when there are storms and tornadoes predicted in the area because he hopes it will save his job.

title: The Empty Chair
description: A TV couple find their lives and relationship deteriorating, leading them to face a wrong decision in their past.

title: God Bless the Child
description: A teen is about to throw away her ambitions of music and education by starting to use drugs. The angels use her love of music to tell her the story of Billie Holiday's tragic life in hopes of helping the teen follow her dream without drugs.

title: Reasonable Doubt
description: Monica serves on a jury duty and is the lone person who thinks the accused is not guilty.

title: The Grudge
description: Andrew is a judge, Monica and Tess are sentenced to community service. They work with two arguing people who once were in love years ago, but forbidden to marry. Can the angels heal their feud and help them find their love again?

title: An Angel on My Tree
description: The family of a convicted murderer face a bleak Christmas in a town which blames them.

title: Mi Familia
description: A young Latino must refuse a scholarship because his migrant worker father thinks the only way for the family to survive is by staying together.

title: The Lord Moves in Mysterious Ways
description: Tess is late to her own party because she stops to help a snobby woman who lost her father as a child. A quirky angel reveals a secret that helps the woman cope with her troubles.

title: A Death in the Family
description: An officer's accidental shot at a young African American boy is taken as prejudice.

title: Bringer of Light
description: Andrew is a teacher who shows his students the stars and the mighty universe. A teenager believes in God and the universe and wants her mother who is dying of cancer to believe.

title: Thief of Hearts
description: Alice is a bitter woman who owns a small store in the lobby of a building. A young boy, Cory, steals a special locket from the store. The angels help find the homeless boy and locket, and find a way to make Alice and Cory a family.

title: Winners, Losers & Leftovers
description: A father struggles with the choice he must make between his job and his son with Downs Syndrome.

title: I Am an Angel
description: A conceited actor who plays an angel on television resists a very young, obsessed fan who is coping with his mother's death.

title: Visions of Thy Father
description: Jason is a teenager who looks up to his ophthalmologist father. Since Jason wants to be a photojournalist, the angels give him a chance to do a photo story on his father. In his photo quest, Jason finds out his father is having an affair.

title: The Penalty Box
description: A rich teenager whose life is laid out for him, is set up when his father has to declare bankruptcy. His plans for Harvard and soccer seem lost when he has to go to a local school with a mediocre soccer team.

title: Band of Angels
description: After killing his elderly friend, a troubled teen is imprisoned and eventually starts a group of singers that also just happen to be delinquents like himself.

title: The Sign of the Dove
description: Andrew rebels when another angel of death is assigned to a descendant of a long line of people that has previously been his responsibility. Includes many flashbacks to the deaths of people that Andrew has been assigned to.

title: The Face of God
description: Monica must try to convince a scientist that creating life from a test tube is not what God intends. The woman is trying to create a child for a noble prize, and then realizes she is trying to create someone to love.

title: Netherlands
description: Monica's faith is challenged by the devil himself after she witnesses a tragic accident.

title: Shallow Water: Part 1
description: Monica is assigned to help a former member of a gospel choir, who has retreated from reality following the death of most of the group in a bus wreck.

title: Shallow Water: Part 2
description: Monica has found J.D. Winslow, but he's not the Jed that Diana desperately wants to come to her planned family reunion. Will Diana's faith give her the strength to face the truth?

title: Holy of Holies
description: Monica, Tess and Andrew help train their newest angel, Gloria. Their assignment is to help a college professor in his quest for the Ark of the Covenant.

title: The Perfect Game
description: A father tries to control his son's life and is obsessed with his baseball performance. The angels help heal the father and son relationship by showing the father he must first heal the relationship he has with his own father.

title: The Birthday Present
description: Young children are beaten and abused by their drunken family. The angels help a mailman who wants to help the children.

title: Manhunt
description: Tess and the other angels return to a small town to help a woman who is lonely after her boyfriend leaves her. The bartenders in the town remember Tess and decide to help the angels play matchmaker with the woman and a delivery man.

title: Chutzpah
description: With memories of her Jewish father's discrimination against women, Rachel releases her fury by publishing comic strips which make fun of her father and his religion.

title: Famous Last Words
description: After discovering a heartbreaking secret about his mother, a man discovers his last chance to repent before being executed for killing his abusive stepfather.

title: Most Likely to Succeed
description: After a long life of hatred towards the football player who stole the girl he loved, Dennis decides to get his revenge at their high school reunion.

title: Heaven's Portal
description: A rebellious teen convinces Gloria to go to a rave with him where they both end up getting high.

title: When Sunny Gets Blue
description: A young man tries to help his mentally ill father, in rebellion against his mother's apparent indifference.

title: Angels Anonymous
description: The angels attempt to change the lives of the individuals in a long lost group of friends. Their influences on these people cause them all to end up unexpectedly at the same Polynesian restaurant, where they are surprised to see one another after all of the years that have passed.

title: A Winter Carol
description: A man who died on 9-11-2001 in the twin towers was a music teacher. His death affects one of his students and his family. The student is depressed, his older brother wants to join the army, and their mayor mother has to help the town.

title: The Last Chapter
description: A mortally ill journalist resists finishing her autobiography because, to be honest, she will have to record her own encounter with an angel.

title: Ship-In-A-Bottle
description: A widowed father with two children has to deal with one daughter having sickle sell anemia. When the daughter gets seriously sick and the local doctor is not available, his daughter dies while he tries to find help.

title: The Blue Angel
description: Max and Elmer are long-time friends. Max is slowly dying due to smoking cigarettes for many years. Elmer tries to get him to stop, but he will not listen. After Monica, Tess, and Andrew fail to get him to stop, Gloria offers to help.

title: Secrets and Lies
description: A father whose daughter has leukemia must ask his ex-wife to allow their son to be a bone marrow daughter. Since his ex-wife refuses, the angels must find a way to help.

title: The Princeless Bride
description: Liz's fiancée Jonas runs away after having a fight with her, causing Liz to reach out to the less fortunate instead of crying for her own loss.

title: Hello, I Love You
description: A young girl in search of the father she has never known is guided to several possibilities.

title: Minute by Minute
description: A nun with a dark past tries to stop two boys from blowing up a high school.

title: The Bells of St. Peters
description: Maggie & Brian are busy doctors. Maggie finds it hard to stop working, while Brian wants time off together. Maggie's mother Rose wants to go to Rome but cannot go alone due to health. Can she convince Maggie & Brian to go with her?

title: The Impossible Dream
description: A man with a beautiful voice is encouraged to sing for the first time in twenty-five years.

title: For All the Tea in China
description: An old British woman is forced to reveal the secrets of her painful past after undergoing a failed background check in order for her grandson to adopt a baby from China.

title: Forever Young
description: A motivational speaker helps other to move forward and achieve, but he and his wife have their own problems of moving forward since their daughter's murder.

title: A Rock and a Hard Place
description: The angels help out a father and son who are having a hard time bonding, and an elderly woman who wants to die so that she may once again be with her husband. Unfortunately, this all is happening at the same time as a potential meteor collision with Earth is headed their way.

title: The Sixteenth Minute
description: Peter is an underpaid businessman, who one day, on his way home from work, just happens to discover a dancer, Marla, trapped in an abandoned mine. With the help of our friendly angel, Andrew, Peter saves Marla by holding a fallen beam in place for over five hours. When rescue personnel arrive, however, they are amazed that Peter held it for so long. Needless to say, he hasn't mentioned Andrew, and he eventually becomes very famous for his good deed. Caught up in the moment, Peter fails to acknowledge Marla's pain when she realizes she has lost her lifelong dream.

title: Two Sides to Every Angel
description: Gloria is duped by a demon pretending to be Monica.

title: The Word
description: A girl with OCD is threatened to be placed in foster care after her illiterate father gives her an overdose of her medication.

title: A Feather on the Breath of God
description: A woman with a young child begins to work at a funeral home to earn money to pay for her own funeral. Unbeknownst to the funeral director and Lorena, they are father and daughter. When Lorena dies, he takes care of his grandchild.

title: Jump!
description: Monica becomes a radio assistant to a crude talk show DJ. One of his callers is a depressed young boy who is on verge of committing suicide. The boy calls into radio show for help. The angels must save the boy and the DJ.

title: Bring on the Rain
description: Monica meets a girl who doesn't want anyone to know she lives on a trailer park with her mother.

title: Remembering Me: Part 1
description: Monica tries to carry on when Tess is placed in a nursing home with severe Alzheimer's.

title: Remembering Me: Part 2
description: Monica's pain at witnessing Tess' helplessness handicaps her both in her assignment and in trying to help Tess.

title: The Christmas Watch
description: The angels help the family of a World Trade Center victim to adjust to their loss.

title: Private Eyes
description: A private eye helps a young girl earn money to stay off the street, by taking pictures of married men wanting to have sex with her. The angels must help him find his true path and help the young girl reunite with her family.

title: And a Nightingale Sang
description: It's Valentine's Day, and business at the restaurant business is slow because of a winter storm. The angels help one couple fall in love, and Andrew is there because one elderly person will die.

title: The Root of All Evil
description: A man confesses to a priest that he is part of a group that is going to rob a bank. The priest tries to find a way to stop the crime without betraying the confessional vows. Two angels of death are there to help Tess and Gloria.

title: A Time for Every Purpose
description: A gravely ill man needs home care. The angels talk to his estranged brother, trying to convince him that his help is needed.

title: As It Is in Heaven
description: Monica goes to driving school. The teacher's son is her assignment. Jesse teaches school in an underprivileged area; one student's father sells drugs and tries to sell them at the school. The angels help Jesse, his mother and the student.

title: Song for My Father
description: A talented teen sings in the choir and a band, but also smokes. She is diagnosed with throat cancer. She is told her vocal cords need to be removed.

title: The Good Earth
description: The angels help an inventor of an energy saving converter meet the owner of an oil company who is dying.

title: Virtual Reality
description: Joshua was in his father's car when his father purposely ran over Marissa Atkins. The angels each have a part in the attempted murder trial, with Joshua as a witness against his father. Joshua perjures himself as Marissa walks in to testify.

title: The Show Must Not Go On
description: A group of actors is obsessed with staging a show to revive an old theater.

title: At the End of the Aisle
description: Monica, Tess and Andrew are invited to the wedding of Audrey, someone they helped before when Audrey's first husband was dying. Gloria is at the wedding for an assignment to help Audrey make the right decision about getting married.

title: I Will Walk with You: Part 1
description: Monica is up for promotion. The angels are being interviewed to see if she is ready. She's sent to a town needing help. An explosion at school killed the students and teachers. It leaves the town in a shadow of grief, blaming an unknown man.

title: I Will Walk with You: Part 2
description: Monica must overcome her revulsion at the person accused of killing schoolchildren in order to complete her assignment.

title: The Homecoming: Part 2
description: The Greens visit the same town where Julia (The Homecoming Part 1) moved. The child adopted by the Green's is Julia's son.
